entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 32 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 36.
